mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET EMAIL = #{email} , BIRTHDAY = #{birthday} , GENDER = #{gender} , PHONE = #{phone} , USER_NAME = #{userName} , ADDRESS = #{address} , CHANGE_PWD = 'N', MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
